text.page:
228
096-114b @#/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM ba ka ba tse/ dzam+b+ha ni/ stam+b+haM ni/ mo ha ni/ sarba ro Sha pra sha ma ni swA hA/ shar phyogs su bltas te 'dug la/ sngags 'di brjod cing rang gi lag pas lan bdun gdong la byugs nas tshogs kyi nang du song na khros pa dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /khro ba zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//
